p.d: Pedro shares his life with an ironing board. He sleeps and eats on it, uses it to iron his favourite tracksuit and takes it with him when he goes running. In the village everyone admires him and sees him as an example. Then, one night, the worst happens... Direction, screenplay: Ivan Rabbiosi (France, 2019) Genre: comedy drama Awards: selected for Filmets (Spain, 2020), the TAAF (Japan, 2020), for Anima (Belgium, 2020), for the Trouville Off-Courts festival (France, 2019)
